pleaseEnterEmailAndPassword: Please enter your email & password to sign in.
directed_to_home_page: You will be directed to the homepage.
no_account_found: No account found with this email.
create_account_in_second: Create your account in seconds. We'll help you find your perfect match.
we_have_sent: We have sent an email to
click_the_link_inside_to: Click the link inside to get started.
can_we_get_ur_number: Can we get your telephone number?
phone_verification_info: We need your phone number to verify that it is you and to contact you if necessary. Thank you. We will not share it.
nickname_info: Create a unique nickname that represents you. It/s how others will know and remember you.
birthday_info: Tell us your birthdate. Your profile does not display your birthdate, only your age.
gender_info: Choose the gender that best represents you. Authenticity is key to meaningful connections.
who_to_meet: Who do you want to meet?
who_to_meet_info: Choose the gender that you want to meet with
relationship_goals_info: Choose the type of relationship you're seeking on Datify. Love, friendship, or something in between—it's your choice.
dating_info: Seeking love and meaningful connections? Choose dating for genuine relationships.
friendship_info: Expand your social circle and make new friends. Opt for friendship today.
casual_info: Looking for fun and relaxed encounters? Select casual for carefree connections.
serious_relationship_info: Ready for commitment and a lasting partnership? Pick serious relationship.
upload_photos_info: Share your energy right from the entrance! A filter-free selfie is the best way to show who you are and get noticed instantly.
error_uploading_image: Error al subir la imagen. Por favor, verifica tu conexión a Internet.
nickname_validation: Nickname should be at least 3 characters long
no_likes: No Signals. Go to Home and Swipe
no_matches: No Encounters. Go to Home and Swipe to have an encounter
not_informed_message: They will not be informed about this.
cannot_find_profile_message: They will not be able to find your profile and send you messages.

user_not_found: You can see the person you have blocked under the blocked users list in the up right menu of the app.

you_both_like_each_other: Break the ice at the bar: let's grab a drink!
